data.text: @Renegade0x6 Life does that to you. Wait until you find yourself in a 55+ community- I had all the negative preconceptions- and here we are loving our new life chapter.

@johnmccumber I never thought in a 100 years I would live in Florida. Too hot. Alligators. Florida Man. Then two folks I really respect said - we left gov and are at this company in Fl. Next thing I know I’m in Fl and we’ve lived here longer now than anywhere else we’ve been previously. Crazy
@bay_snark None of that was cheap or shoddy workmanship

@johnmccumber I'm happy you landed on your feet in FL. The fact that you ran the flooring material under the cabs was smart. Especially in bathrooms with tile floors, as most will change out a vanity cab’t before redoing the floor. The buyers in NC don't know how lucky they are!
@Nav5_Oh Ya know, sir, you are absolutely correct. I always need to keep my eye on the prize.
@johnmccumber Yeah but the Blue Hour by the pool
@OPFORPio None so far.  We are enjoying our new lifestyle.
